{{ja-kanjitab|片|栗|粉}}

===Etymology===
Originally produced from the {{m|ja|片栗||katakuri lily|tr=[[かたくり]], [[katakuri]]|sc=Jpan}} ({{taxlink|Erythronium japonicum|species|noshow=1}}), hence the term, it in now largely produced from potatoes, as these are much cheaper, but the term is retained.
